extension.name: ETL particle Resto Booking (EN)
extension.author: Bertrand Pascal - En Toutes Lettres
extension.description:
Particle "Restaurant Booking" for Gantry 5 v1.0 - Template Hydrogen (English version)

This particle follows the general principle of the "Booking Form" particle of RocketTheme presented with the Sienna template.

Adaptation for Hydrogen by En Toutes Lettres (https://www.en-toutes-lettres.fr)

Don't forget to add this line

@import 'etl_restobooking';

in your custom CSS file, custom.scss (/templates/g5_hydrogen/custom/scss/custom.scss)

or create this file and add this line with your text editor (/templates/g5_hydrogen/custom/scss/custom.scss)
